verses.roman:
taiche tumi navadvīpe kari' avatāra
sakala-brahmāṇḍa-jīvera karilā nistāra

synonyms: taiche—in that way; tumi—You; navadvīpe—at Navadvīpa; kari' avatāra—descending as an incarnation; sakala—all; brahmāṇḍa—of the universe; jīvera—the living entities; karilā nistāra—have delivered;
translation: "By descending as an incarnation at Navadvīpa, You, just like Kṛṣṇa, have already delivered all the living entities of the universe.
